alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 7:49PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Otsego and northeastern Chenango Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 749 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Berlin, or 11 miles northeast of Norwich, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hartwick, Edmeston, Sherburne, Pittsfield, Burlington, New Lisbon, New Berlin, Columbus, Morris and Laurens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
